titleStmt.title: Description of Targumic paraphrase to the Song of Songs accompanied with an Arabic translation

notesStmt.note: Uniform layout. Slight water damage. Scribbles on the first and last pages (folios 1r and 41v).
Catalogue of Hebrew Manuscripts in the Gaster Collection, the British Library, London (London: Hebrew Section. Oriental and India Office Collection, 1996).

msContents.summary: Targumic paraphrase to the Song of Songs accompanied with an Arabic translation

collation.p: Indeterminable (binding too tight). Catchwords on every recto and verso. Ruling in pencil.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite square script of the 19th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Brit. Mus. Or. 9912. Song of Songs. Aramaic & Arabic.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Moses Gaster (b. 1856, d. 1939), scholar and rabbi: his manuscript, Cod. G. 753: inscribed with his name (folio 1r); purchased by the British Museum from him on 12 April, 1924: inscribed (back flyleaf [i]v).
